creator: Ontario Tech University
descriptionHtml:
Find out what’s happening on campus with Ontario Tech University's official mobile app! Students, faculty, staff, alumni and visitors can access the latest news, events, athletics updates, campus maps and more.

== Choose your experience ==

- Student experience -
Stay connected and informed: access your course information, weekly schedules, grades, holds, records, Blackboard, student email and more! Never miss a beat with opt-in notifications and personalized event calendars.

- Faculty and staff experience -
Get notifications about important news and events, the Weekly Report, staff discounts, easy access to campus services! Find contact information quickly in the staff directory or Expert Centre.

- Alumni experience -
Stay connected with the university: check up on the Alumni Magazine, apply for the Student Alumni Mentorship Program, or nominate an outstanding graduate for an Alumni Award!

== Feature list - Students ==

- Courses -
A mobile collection of MyCampus services, where you can view your course information, weekly schedules, grades, holds and academic records. Stay tuned for the next version, which will include additional features such as adding/dropping classes!

- Blackboard -
Easy access to Blackboard features directly from the app.

- UOITnet -
Quick access to your student email.

- Registrar -
Easy access to forms, documents and important information.

- Student life -
Read the latest student writing in the Digital Community Blog!

== Feature list - Faculty and staff ==

- Weekly Report -
Receive notifications and quickly view the Weekly Report at any time.

- Staff discounts -
View our staff discounts section to see how working at the university can save you money!

- Services -
Quick access to the various faculty and department websites and in-app services.

== Feature list - Alumni ==

- Connected -
Stay up to date on alumni news with Connected, the online alumni magazine!

- StAMP -
A program for mentors and mentees to connect.

- Nomination form -
Nominate an outstanding graduate for our Alumni Association Awards.

== Feature list - General ==

- Athletics -
News, schedules, scores and other information from our Athletics department. Go Ridgebacks!

- Campus map -
Get information on buildings, search for directions and see what other buildings are around you.

- Directory -
Search for faculty and staff, and make a call from your device at the tap of a button!

- Events -
Find out what’s happening around the university. Includes important dates from the Academic Calendar!

- Expert Centre - 
Search our extensive list of university experts for any area of expertise.

- Food services -
Look up hours and locations of your favourite eateries on campus!

- News -
Stay up to date on the latest news and events from around the university.

- Student services -
Explore the many services offered at Ontario Tech.
…plus many more—and more to come!
descriptionShort: See what’s happening on campus with Ontario Tech's official mobile app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improved performance, bug fixes and enhancements.
